Articles.Content:
So a while back, when Spaceport was around, I made a mod called MegaDecouplers, which was my first mod (that I modeled). However, due to Spaceport being closed, I lost my mod, and I was stupid not to have backed it up. And then I found it reuploaded on Kerbal Space Parts (yay), so I'll go ahead and post it here so it doesn't get lost again.

Basically, these are powerful decouplers you can use for a cannon or something.

ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION:

I added more powerful decouplers that have many different uses. Some are as follows:

Launching a probe from an orbital space station back down to Kerbin.

Making a cannon

Blowing things up.

Deorbiting ships.

Heres a pic:
